src:
En sexenios de guerra contra el narco se ajusticiaba y se hacía burla de delincuentes: AMLO | Entérate
 by Redacción AN / AL



El presidente Andrés Manuel López Obrador afirmó que durante los sexenios de la guerra contra el narcotráfico se ajusticiaban a presuntos delincuentes y se hacía burla de los fallecidos, generando odio; recordó el caso de capos de la droga que eran fotografiados tras ser abatidos. Sostuvo que eso ya no pasa y que las fuerzas federales cumplen su responsabilidad.
text:
During the six-year war against the narco, criminals were executed and mocked: AMLO | Find out
 by AN / AL Writing



President Andrés Manuel López Obrador affirmed that during the six years of the war against drug trafficking, criminals were executed and mocked the deceased, generating hatred; He recalled the case of drug lords who were photographed after being killed. He said that does not happen anymore and that federal forces fulfill their responsibility.
